casebody.data:
MISSION HOSPITALS
v.
RADIATION THERAPY. No. 498P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 15, 2006. Robert V. Bode, S. Todd Hemphill, Diana Evans Ricketts, Matthew A. Fisher, Raleigh, for Asheville Hematology. June S. Ferrell, Assistant Attorney General, for DHR. Susan H. Hargrove, Sean A. Timmons, Jennifer B. Markham, Raleigh, for NC Radiation Therapy. Maureen D. Murray, Allyson Jones Labbon, Greensboro, William W. Stewart, Raleigh, for Mission Hospitals.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of September 2006 by Intervenor for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of September 2006."
